entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as the one who introduces Professor Moody. He is described as 'brightly' and it is mentioned that he put his hands together to applaud.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is also introduced as the one who applauds along with Dumbledore. He is described as putting his hands together to applaud.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is introduced as the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher. His appearance is described as 'bizarre'.

entities.name: professor moody
entities.description: Professor Moody is mentioned as the title of the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is mentioned as a nickname for Professor Moody. It is also mentioned that Harry's dad went to help him this morning.

relationships.description: Dumbledore introduces Professor Moody as the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.
Hagrid applauds along with Dumbledore when introducing Professor Moody.
